document.full_text: as much of a quarter of the recent decline in the u.s. jobless rate is due to long-term unemployment benefits running out, according to research from the chicago federal reserve bank published on tuesday.
document.title: lower jobless rate reflects benefits end: fed
lines_and_colors: as much of a quarter of the recent decline in the u.s. jobless rate is due to long-term unemployment benefits running out, according to research from the chicago federal reserve bank published on tuesday.
